title.rendered: Double Sided Green Cutting Mat Board A4 Size Pad Model Healing Design

content.rendered: Green Cutting Mat Board A4 Size Pad Model Hobby Design Craft Tools Material: PVC Color: Green Size: (L)X(W)XH 30X22X1cm /11.81”X8.66”X0.01″(appr.) Perfect for use with cutters & craft knives to trim, score and cut any material. -Double sided Design, clear marking guides to help you cut straight lines and accurate angle. -Ideal for patchwork, quilting, card-making & scrapbooking projects, any other craft purposes, etc This item features a variety of markings on the face such as a useful 1cm grid, 10-degree increment angles, 1mm step ruler, curved and circular markings. The reverse is plain. -Can protect the desktop, to avoid the desktop scratched by a variety of sharp tools, or to avoid glue and paint pollute desktop.

excerpt.rendered:
Brand:  Generic

Product Dimensions:    30L x 22W x 2H Centimeters

Material: Polyvinyl Chloride (PVC)

1 pcs self healing cutting mat A3 size, large and convenient for various crafting project
